评论详情: I purchased in the size I usually get for nice shirts, a Large. The shirt fit nice, hugs me like I prefer. The quality of the fabric was good. Soft and comfy. The style is very nice, cute and just what I wanted. Unfortunately the off the shoulder fold and fabric is not sewn down, leading it to ride up. I had someone help me pull it down, but there isn't enough fabric or stretch to fit properl
Super cute I like the style but you can’t move your arms AT ALL in this sweater because it’s not sewn down whatsoever. Sadly I’ll be returning this

For reference, I’m 5’2 and 105lbs.  So, this is what I like to call a gamble piece. No prior ratings or reviews, lower priced, but still cute enough that I would buy it just to see if I’d like it. The material is so thin everything underneath is see through, the straps are not even straps lol they will fall off in 2.2 seconds, and you can barely move your arms while wearing it cuz the flap that’s supposed to cover your bust constricts your movements. I’m definitely returning this.
Passt, Stoff toll und sieht aus wie auf dem Bild. Kind zufrieden und wir auch. Gerne wieder.
